p: If responsibility for the pandemic can be assigned to the only (or main) constituent of the virus-toxic stressors combination nexus with no backing from the aforementioned powerful stakeholders, then these production and/or consumption stakeholders are protected from responsibility for (and ensuing legal consequences from) the deaths that occurred and were attributed to SARS-CoV-2/COVID-19 and the trillions of dollars of lost revenue in the global economy that resulted from the lockdown. Assigning responsibility for the pandemic to Mother Nature rather than to those who bear the major responsibility for laying the pandemic groundwork ensures that these harmful practices and their associated pandemics (including the annual deaths of the most vulnerable demographic related to the so-called influenza epidemics/pandemics) will continue unabated.
